required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neuropsychological Profiles of Pediatric Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
clinical_study.official_title: Investigating the Neuropsychological Profile of Youth With Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)

brief_summary.textblock: The neuropsychological profiles of children treated with standard CBT for OCD are evaluated.

detailed_description.textblock: The neuropsychological profiles of children treated with standard CBT for the treatment of OCD will be compared at pre-treatment and post-treatment. Children between the ages of 8 and 16 years who have a primary diagnosis of OCD will be participants. Treatment will last 12 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Children's Yale Brown Obsessive Compulsive Scale measures change in severity of OCD symptoms from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
primary_outcome.description: Measures presence and severity of obsessions and compulsions.

secondary_outcome.measure: Anxiety Disorders Interview Schedule-Diagnostic and Statistical Manual-IV measures change in severity of OCD symptoms from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to starting treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Interview measure of the presence of OCD, related anxiety disorders and other psychological disorders of childhood.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical Global Impression Severity and Improvement Scales measures change in severity of OCD and co-morbid disorders from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Measure of the severity of the disorders and their improvement as a result of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Global Assessment Scale for Children measures change in overall functioning from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Assesses the overall general functioning of youth under the age of 18.

secondary_outcome.measure: Child Obsessive-Compulsive Inventory measures change in severity of OCD symptoms from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of presence of obsessive compulsive symptoms over the past week.

secondary_outcome.measure: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function measures change in executive functioning from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: Multidimensional Anxiety Scale for Children measures change in severity of anxiety symptoms from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Measure of the presence and severity of anxiety symptoms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Child Behavior Checklist measures change in severity internalizing and externalizing symptoms from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Broadband measure of child's psychological functioning.

secondary_outcome.measure: Screen for Child Anxiety and Related Emotional Disorders measures change in severity of anxiety and other disorders from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Measure of the presence and severity of a wide range of emotional disorders.

secondary_outcome.measure: Brief Symptom Interview measures change in severity of parental psychopathology from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: Family Accommodation Scale measures change in parental accommodation from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Measure of the degree to which parents accommodate to their child's OCD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Test of Everyday Attention-Children's Version measures change in attention from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Neuropsychological measure of the participant's selective, divided, sustained and switching attention

secondary_outcome.measure: Wisconsin Card Sorting Test Revised and Expanded measures change in executive functioning from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: Delis-Kaplan Executive Function System measures change in executive functioning from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
secondary_outcome.description: Neuropsychological test of a variety of verbal and nonverbal executive functions.

secondary_outcome.measure: Children's Color Trails Test measures change in cognitive flexibility from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: The Conners' Continuous Performance Test II Version 5measures change in continuous attention from baseline to post-treatment and assesses maintenance of treatment effects at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (one week prior to start of treatment, post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)

other_outcome.measure: Perception of Therapeutic Relationship measures quality of therapeutic relationship at post-treatment and at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
other_outcome.time_frame: Post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
other_outcome.description: Measure of the participant's perception of the therapeutic relationship

other_outcome.measure: Satisfaction Questionnaire measures satisfaction with treatment at post-treatment and at one year and two year follow-up assessments.
other_outcome.time_frame: Post treatment (within one week of completing treatment) and follow-ups (six months, and at one year intervals for up to two years following treatment)
other_outcome.description: Measures the patient's satisfaction with treatment.

arm_group.description: Participants complete standard CBT for OCD

intervention.description: Participants complete standard CBT for OCD as delivered in the POTS study .

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children 8-16 years old who have a primary diagnosis of Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
Exclusion Criteria:
- Risk of suicidal or homicidal behavior
- Presence of another psychological disorder as the primary disorder
- Psychotic disorder, bipolar disorder, Pervasive Developmental Disorder, Thought Disorder, Uncontrolled ADHD, Eating Disorder, Substance Use Disorders, School refusal behavior characterized by missing more than 25% of days in most recent term, does not speak English, youth does not have at least one parent who speaks English
